page.title: 11Bonfire Night, New Deer
page.content:
Every year we have a big bonfire in a field near our house at the weekend nearest the 5th of November. All our friends come with their parents and bring some fireworks, sparklers and food. Our mum helps us make a Guy to put on the top of the fire and our dad and neighbours build the fire. All the fireworks are put in a tin and some of the dads set them off in the field. We bake potatoes in the edge of the fire and have supper while we watch the fireworks. Each year we have about 60 people aged 2 to 50 at our bonfire and while the older ones enjoy the firework display, the young ones have lots of fun with sparklers.
Kate & Jane Smith.
